about_the_game:
Experience multi-battlefield strategy like never before in Survivor Manager!
Manage and control four characters simultaneously, engaging in endless battles against waves of enemies.

Players select four characters with unique skills and abilities to fight across four separate battlefields. Characters automatically attack enemies, while you decide their positioning and growth strategies. Defeat enemies to earn experience, level up, and unlock powerful skills and items.

Key Features:

  • Unique 4-split screen battles: Oversee and manage multiple battlefields at once.

  • Strategic character combinations: Create the perfect team by combining diverse abilities.

  • Endless growth and challenge: Gain rewards through battles and dominate with new skills and powerful items.

  • Immersive survival battles: Fight through waves of enemies and conquer each battlefield to emerge victorious.

Ready to manage your team, strategize, and survive the chaos?
Take on the challenge in Survivor Manager today!

name: Survivor Manager

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Experience Survivor Manager's unique multi-battlefield strategy! Control four characters across separate battlefields, attacking automatically while you decide upgrades and placement. Defeat enemies, gain experience, and unlock powerful skills. Ready for the challenge? Join the fight now!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
